replies.msg: 正苦intern 照殺

My friend Celine is a CFO at Zara. If he takes the job at the Bank of China, she'll be four thousand three hundred dollars a month better off but she's still better off now than she was four years ago when she was working beneath everybody else in the department. She thinks a financial analyst position is beneath her. If she hadn't taken the CFA exam level three four years before, she wouldn't be working as a CFO now. If she'd pursued a career in sales instead of finance, her salary would be much lower. If it hadn't been for her uncle's referral to Zara, her career wouldn't take off now and she wouldn't start earning a lot of money. Recently, her sister married her high school sweetheart. Her mum felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her auntie feels her husband is beneath her as well. She enjoys socializing with the better off. I saw Joey Yung live twice at the Hong Kong Colosseum with my friends which was absolutely incredible and unforgettable. The first time we saw her concert, we were late. I remember I said "Look at the time. The concert will have begun." It was quarter of ten. The concert would've started by then. Celine's brother has been having a crush on this girl named  Shirley for eight years but Shirley has a boyfriend. His friend said "That's totally fair. She's quite attractive." But he's beginning to realize he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just not worth it. His auntie said "you would be better off without her." His dad too said "You'll be better off without her."
